___name.description: The name of the contact point.

___email.description: Email contact information for this entity.

___phoneNumber.description: Phone numbers at which this entity can be reached

___name.description: The name for the Sas Implementation Record.

$eref.description: Describe all the Fcc related Information of SAS

___frn.description: The FRN of the certified entity, if applicable. For a device, shall not be included.

___certificationConditions.description: Human-readable string or reference annotating the certification

___sasPhase.description: If this is a SAS information object, defines the Phase (1 or 2) of certification.

___certificationExpiration.description: Date of certification expiration, in format YYYY-MM-DD

___certificationDate.description: Date of certification, in format YYYY-MM-DD.

___fccInformation.description: Contains the FCC certification information for this SAS implementation.

___url.description: Publicly addressable URL for the SAS

___id.description: Unique designator for the Sas Implementation Record.

___administratorId.description: Reference Id of Sas Administrator Object
